author: rovere
body:
A crash[1] has been reported while producing samples for the Upgrade with PU.
This PR fixed the problem by limiting the CaloParticle validation to only event,bx 0,0.
For the moment this is enough, in future we would extend it to also event and bx different from 0, by adding the proper infrastructure.


[1] [link](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/hgcal-simulation/69.html)
title: Fix calo particle Validation in mixing
